symptoms.name: Heart failure
symptoms.pattern: New onset or worsening, chronic, or life-threatening

symptoms.name: Chest pain
symptoms.pattern: May be present, especially in adults

imaging_findings.cardiac magnetic resonance imaging (CMR): May show abnormalities; considered a reliable diagnostic indicator in conjunction with Lake Louise criteria

required: At least one clinical presentation (e.g., new onset heart failure, acute coronary syndrome-like presentation) AND at least one diagnostic criterion (e.g., abnormal ECG, elevated myocardiocytolysis markers, abnormal cardiac imaging)
supportive: Two diagnostic criteria for asymptomatic myocarditis
